title: Fremantle Self-Contained Apartments with Rooftop Restaurant & Bar
description: Unearth the uber-cool jewels of East Fremantle when you stay in the smart Richmond Quarter development at Nautica Residences Fremantle. During your stay, enjoy the use of the European-style piazza and the rooftop restaurant and cocktail bar with views across the Swan River and harbour. Meanwhile, the George Street precinct, the cafes of North Fremantle and the walking trails along Swan River are all a short wander from the hotel.
offer_address: 1 Silas St, East Fremantle 6158, Western Australia
